version_description:
- Family Plan: a new way to share your Magzter GOLD subscription with your family members
- Filter option: Filter magazines by Language, Age rating and Magzter GOLD magazines
- Fixed crash issue on iOS 7 for few users

- Read news for free in select countries (expanding to more regions)
- Follow keyword topics and get custom notifications
- Completely redesigned magazine reader
- Enhanced search and social sharing

Magzter has raised the bar for what a digital magazine can do with the introduction of Clipping, an exciting and fun new feature that lets you “clip" any section of a magazine page and save it, share it with your friends or post it to your favorite social

- Introducing Articles – featuring an exciting showcase of magazine articles from today’s most popular magazines! Digital magazine articles have never looked this good!
- New Reading Experience - an iPhone-friendly reading experience for the articles s

- Introducing Articles – featuring an exciting showcase of magazine articles from today’s most popular magazines! Digital magazine articles have never looked this good!
- New Reading Experience - an iPhone-friendly reading experience for the articles s

- 为你带来突破性的全新阅读体验，涵盖当前流行杂志的精彩文章！ 数码杂志文章从未如此美观！
- 强大的全局搜索功能。现在你可以通过标题、爱好分类、甚至杂志内容关键词来进行搜索！
- 包含从上千种杂志中精心选出的文章，横跨多种内容类别，并为所有屏幕大小进行优化。
- 下载速度更快以及其他性能改进。

Magzter, the largest digital magazine store and newsstand in the world, introduces a game-changing new feature in its latest app update.

Magzter’s new “Easy Read” revolutionizes the digital magazine experience by presenting magazine articles in re

全球最大的数码杂志商店和报刊亭 Magzter 在最新版应用更新中推出改变产业的新功能。 有史以来，智能手机用户首次可以最自然的方式阅读杂志。不仅文章字体清晰易读，还伴有精美高清图片！

Magzter 的全新 ezRead 2.0 以响应式 HTML 格局显示杂志文章，可自动根据屏幕大小（无论是手机还是平板）进行优化，彻底革新数码杂志体验。 在小屏幕上阅读数码杂志不再需要艰难地平移和缩放！

Magzter 的 ezRead 2.0 并不是将杂志文章转成文字版，而是将包括照片和图

- Rich push notifications
- Reader improvements

Notification center:
The all-new exciting notification center inside the Magzter app keeps you updated with all the must-read magazines, articles and news from around the world. Keep visiting the notification center to stay tuned to our incredible deal

- Added an all-new 'Auto-clear' functionality to free up memory

- Various bug fixes and improvements

- 介绍智能阅读区，这是一个令人兴奋的地理围栏功能，使用户可以在全球指定地点无限阅读杂志和文章。 无论您是在机场等候您的航班，还是在咖啡厅，智能阅读区放松，放纵无限的阅读。
- Magazine reader improvements

•以闪电般的效果引入全新的令人兴奋的“搜索”功能，其中还包括杂志内容的结果。
•您现在可以使用Magzter GOLD订阅访问数百个特殊问题。
•您最喜欢的文章阅读器变得更好 - 您现在可以随心所欲地控制字体大小，而不会让眼睛紧张。
• Improved ‘Search’ feature with lightning fast results, that also includes results from magazine content.
Introducing Text-to-Speech feature for Articles - Now you can listen to curated premium articles from best-selling magazines at the tap of a button.

- We’ve improved the Magzter GOLD Family Sharing feature on the app. Now you can specify the age group of the family members so that they get access to appropriate magazines.
- The app is now fully supported on the latest Apple smartphones, iPhone XS

- Reading magazines has never been easier and more fun. No longer is awkward panning and zooming required to read a digital magazine story on a small screen.

- Your favorite Magzter app is now also available in Spanish, French, German, Russian, Dutch, Chinese Simplified and Turkish languages.
- Enhanced Smart Reading Zone (SRZ) tab with age filter and search functionality.
